hindi.title: Dhurandhar
hindi.overview: A mysterious traveler slips into the heart of Karachi's underbelly and rises through its ranks with lethal precision, only to tear the notorious ISI-Underworld nexus apart from within.

hindi.title: Shahenshah
hindi.overview: Inspector Srivastav is framed by a wily and cunning gangster, J.K., and unable to prove his innocence, hangs himself, leaving behind his wife, and son, Vijay.

hindi.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
hindi.overview: Raj is a rich, carefree, happy-go-lucky second generation NRI. Simran is the daughter of Chaudhary Baldev Singh.

hindi.title: PK
hindi.overview: A stranger in the city asks questions no one has asked before.

hindi.title: Chhaava
hindi.overview: Shivaji's death sparks the Maratha-Mughal conflict. His son Sambhaji leads resistance against Aurangzeb's forces.

hindi.title: 3 Idiots
hindi.overview: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently.

english.title: Mercy
english.overview: In the near future, a detective stands on trial accused of murdering his wife.

english.title: Space/Time
english.overview: A disgraced team of scientists enters the criminal underworld to rebuild a forbidden space-bending engine.

english.title: Greenland 2: Migration
english.overview: The Garrity family must risk everything to embark on a perilous journey across the wasteland of Europe.

english.title: Zootopia 2
english.overview: Rookie cops Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde find themselves on the twisting trail of a great mystery.

top_rated.title: The Shawshank Redemption

top_rated.title: The Godfather
top_rated.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family.

top_rated.title: The Dark Knight
top_rated.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime.

top_rated.title: Interstellar
top_rated.overview: The adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole.

top_rated.title: Parasite
top_rated.overview: All unemployed, Ki-taek's family takes peculiar interest in the wealthy and glamorous Parks.

south.title: Laila

south.overview: A fictional history of two legendary revolutionaries' journey away from home.
